body:
Use this service to check if you need to tell people about offences on your criminal record.

Criminal records include:

* cautions given by the police
* convictions given at court

components.html: You do not need to tell anyone about an expired ('spent') caution or conviction unless an [exception applies](https://www.gov.uk/exoffenders-and-employment?#when-employers-still-need-to-know-about-your-conviction).

**Who can use this service**

This service is for people in England and Wales.

It will tell you if you legally have to disclose a caution or conviction when applying for:

* a job
* a place at college or university
* insurance

If you have more than one caution or conviction, youâ€™ll need to work out the expiry date of each one separately.
